Detailed Description

Text extracted by the recognizer.

This class stores the text that has been extracted from the press clip during the recognition process. It also keeps the number of appearances of every word in text.

Author:
Eliezer Talón (elitalon@gmail.com)
Date:
2008-10-08

Member Function Documentation

void Text::addCharacter ( const std::string &  character,
const unsigned int &  position 
)

Adds a character to text at the given position.

Precondition:
Though typed as string, the character passed as parameter must contain exactly one character. Otherwise the first charactes is taken.
Parameters:
character Character to add
position Position where adding the character to
Author:
Eliezer Talón (elitalon@gmail.com)
Date:
2008-10-06
If the position passed is above the text total length the character is appended to the end of the text. If the position passed is less than 0, the character is inserted at the beginning of the text.

void Text::updateWordRate ( const std::string &  word  )  [private]

Increases by one the number of appearances of a word.

Parameters:
word Word whose appearance rate must be update
Postcondition:
Each time this method is called, the previous word rates are cleared.
Warning:
This method must be called whenever the content changes.
Author:
Eliezer Talón (elitalon@gmail.com)
Date:
